trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings"></xref> class by copying the values of an existing <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings"></xref>通过复制现有的值的类<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContextSettings"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a XAML schema and its context use fully qualified assembly names in the values that are returned by the lookup API.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定 XAML 架构及其上下文是否在查找 API 返回的值中使用完全限定程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property influences the strings that are returned by <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetAllXamlNamespaces%2A> in the constructed schema context.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值会影响返回的字符串<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetAllXamlNamespaces%2A>中构造的架构上下文。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.GetAllXamlNamespaces%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A> is `true`, the assembly part of the string reports the equivalent of <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A>是`true`，字符串的程序集一部分报告<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的等效项</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.FullyQualifyAssemblyNamesInClrNamespaces%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a XAML schema and its context use fully qualified assembly names in the values that are returned by the lookup APIs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 XAML 架构和其上下文查找 Api; 返回的值中使用完全限定程序集名称否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a XAML schema context allows for markup extensions that have two constructors with the same arity (number of input parameters).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否允许拥有带相同 arity （多个输入参数） 的两个构造函数的标记扩展的 XAML 架构上下文。

trans-unit.source: From a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>, you cannot read the settings directly.
Instead, you receive values from specific read-only properties, such as <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A>, which report the settings-based values.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你收到的值从特定的只读属性，如<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A>，它报告基于设置的值。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext.SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema context allows for markup extensions that have duplicate arity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果架构上下文允许有重复 arity; 的标记扩展否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
